wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.title: WFRP4e - Prone at Zero Wounds
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.description: Automatically shows a chat button to apply the Prone condition when an Actor reaches 0 Wounds.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.enable: If disabled, the module will do nothing when an Actor reaches 0 Wounds.
Show the message when a Player Character is reduced to 0 Wounds.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.pcReci: Who should receive the chat message when a Player Character reaches 0 Wounds?
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.enable: Show the message when an NPC or creature is reduced to 0 Wounds.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.npcRec: Who should receive the chat message when an NPC or creature reaches 0 Wounds?
